name: What is Intercom?
subheader: How Intercom works, what it can do for your business and what makes it different to other solutions
title_def: Intercom is a Customer Service Solution. Resolve issues faster and boost customer satisfaction—all while reducing team workload—with the only customer service solution you'll ever need. Combine automation and human support today.

questions_one.name: What can I do with Intercom?

answer.start: Speed and scale like never before with automated customer service
answer.para: Free your team from repetitive questions using automated chatbots. Maximize team efficiency with AI-powered tools.

answer.start: Maximize team productivity with the world's fastest shared Inbox
